project.name: Openstack
project.description: The Gentoo Openstack Project maintains packages for Openstack and some of it's dependancies.

longdescription.p: Openstack is an IaaS which helps in the managment and deployment of phsyical resources. Some of these resources may be used for virtualization (and is one of the primary focuses of the upstream Openstack project).
Openstack can manage a few hypervisors. But the list of features changes often so it is best to refrence upstream.

goals.p: The current goal is to make Gentoo a first class citizen for hosting Openstack. Particlar focus is going to be made on security releases. There will also be a focus on maintaining 2-3 major release versions along with git head in a usable state. Todo is an irc channel a mail-alias, and maybe a mailing list.

body.p: You can reach all our developers (and some users of course) in #gentoo-virtualization on irc.freenode.net
We have a list on lists.gentoo.org named openstack-dev along with a openstack alias on the primary gentoo hostname.
